question: A committee has been formed by which Union Ministry for study on origin of Indian culture?
option3: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
explanation:
The Government of India has formed a committee for conducting a study on the origin and evolution of 12,000-year-old Indian culture.
The committee comprises of 16 members with K.N. Dikshit, the Chairman of Indian Archaeological Society as a prominent member. The ministry plans to use the report of the committee in textbooks for the purpose of educational research.
